sentences.en: A flow in one direction could be the same as a dash in Morse.
sentences.cn: 这一方向的电流可以作为是莫尔斯电码中的一划.

sentences.en: An intricate etching honors the invention of the telegraph by Samuel Morse.
sentences.cn: 塞缪尔·莫尔斯摩斯电报的发明而尊称为复杂的表现法.

sentences.en: Charles Morse: What one man can do , another can do!
sentences.cn: 于是有人放弃了接受考验, 他们抱怨着自己无法做到.

sentences.en: For details of Morse test, please see PART C.
sentences.cn: 有关莫尔斯电码测验的详情, 请参考丙栏.

sentences.en: He rapped out a Morse message.
sentences.cn: 他嗒嗒地拍发了一份摩尔斯电码的电报.

sentences.en: He was glad that Mr. Morse was not there.
sentences.cn: 莫尔斯先生不在场,他感到高兴.

sentences.en: I realized the extent of the trouble that Mary Morse was brewing up.
sentences.cn: 我意识到了玛丽·莫尔斯正在制造的麻烦有多大。

sentences.en: In 1843, Morse and Vail received funding from the U.S. Congress to set up and test their telegraph system between Washington, D.C., and Baltimore, Maryland.
sentences.cn: 在1843年，摩尔斯和威尔受美国国会资助，在华盛顿和马里兰州的巴尔的摩之间建立电报系统并进行了测试。

sentences.en: In Morse code all letters are four or fewer characters long.
sentences.cn: 在Morse电码中所有字母的长度只有四个或不到四个符号.

sentences.en: KKJBKVUNAAV is any meaning understands Morse code Daren instruction!
sentences.cn: KKJBKVUNAAV是什么意思啊懂摩尔斯电码的达人赐教啊!

sentences.en: Marconi now found that he could transmit Morse Code signals.
sentences.cn: 他现在可以用它来发送和接收莫尔斯电码了.

sentences.en: Not tolk white cat black cat, catch morse are good cats!
sentences.cn: 不论白猫黑猫, 抓到老鼠就是好猫!

sentences.en: The Morse code is made up of dots and dashes.
sentences.cn: 莫尔斯电码是由点和线组成的.

sentences.en: The Morse Code is made up of dots and dashes.
sentences.cn: 莫尔斯电码由点和画线组成.

sentences.en: The residential college system worked better on paper than it did in reality, especially for those of us who were stuck in Morse.
sentences.cn: 住宿学院系统实际操作没有做得文件上写的那么好，尤其是对我们那些陷入摩尔斯代码研究困境的人而言。

sentences.en: Visitors can experiment with Morse Code using a telegraph device.
sentences.cn: 参观者可以用电报设备来尝试使用摩斯代码.

sentences.en: We only used Morse code to keeo in touch.
sentences.cn: 我们只是用摩尔斯密码保持联系。

sentences.en: You can go home afterwards and watch Inspector Morse in colour.
sentences.cn: 之后你就可以回家，看彩色版的电视连续剧《摩斯警长》。
